评论详情: I got the white version of this sweater and it's more like a straight cream color and less of a "heathered" cream, if that makes sense. The sleeves are extra long and are meant to fold over on themselves. The sweater is intentionally low cut so you'll want something underneath it, I think. I was actually surprised at the weight of this sweater and really appreciate the extra density. It's polyester and elastane so there's some stretch to it as well. I normally wear Medium and decided to stay the course with that size when looking at the size chart. I think I would have liked the fit of the Small better since this feels it has a bit too much room where I'm not quite as endowed.  All in all, I like this sweater and I don't feel it was intentionally misrepresented. I think the listing photos should be redone with better lighting to give a more accurate representation of the shirt.
